experience: You and Matthew both know Monte Cahn, Stephen Kowal, and 30 others
Matthew can introduce you to 15 people at Hostgator.com
Join me at Designing a autonomous architecture https://lnkd.in/edAjk96

A mix of backend development, frontend Development, DevOps, system administration, security compliance, automation, general operations, team building and management. At DoubleHorn I work 24/7 to keep all things engineering working towards progress, innovation and providing the best service possible to our clients.Minimal overview of responsibilities:• Evaluated and worked with Engineering members to setup Infrastructure Monitoring• Handled microservice based architecture of Cloud Management Tool• Installation and configuration of SaltStack for orchestration and automated deployments• Developed and maintained automated security audits and server maintenance• Built core internal tool set, with a focus on process automation• Interfaced with cloud clients to handle any issues with service, requests for software installation and configuration and furthering of cloud solutions• Heavy use of Boto3 and Python for Backend Software Work and design of Restful API• Heavy use of AngularJS, ReactJS and Plain old JavaScript• Integration work for Slack, Hipchat, Monitoring and Social Media• Extensive use of AWS, Azure, GCE and Rackspace APIs• Setup of CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins and CodeDeploy• Architect of Kubernetes supported dev/test/production environment
Get it done. Work hard make clients happy.

Continual automation development on many platforms and services to increase overall autonomic resolution of issues for clients ranging from Cisco to Morgan Stanley.Heavy use of Regular Expressions, Python, Perl and Javascript on a daily workflow.

• Continued maintenance on various server side automation tools and scripts• Code Review and QA for Operational Team• Overseeing and implementing enterprise wide software for Endurance International Group• Using Perl, Python, Ruby, PHP and Javascript as needed to accomplish organization's goals

• Performed Linux Technical Quality Assurance for 50+ Linux administrators.• Performed deep audits on all Linux System and Linux Security Administrator to ensure quality of service• Mentored agents and provided advice on areas of improvement as well as training opportunities• Helped in automation of audits and Linux QA workflow• Developed, designed and maintained software for the Quality Assurance department to work more efficiently and for managers to track direct reports progress.

George D. Hamilton
Person man
September 11, 2012, George D. worked with Matthew in different groups

Matt is one of the most talented, intelligent, and professional individuals I have ever had the privilege to work with, at HostGator or anywhere else. He actively seeks to improve his skills in the web hosting arena, and isn't afraid to learn things by doing. He asks the right questions, knows how to find information on his own, and knows how to filter the good stuff from the bad so that he's sure he's on the right track. Matt has performed at an extremely high level in every role he has held at HostGator, to the point where a completely new position was created for him so that his virtues might spread to the others in the company.Also, his charisma is off the charts, he's very honest and supportive, and he's been a great friend since we first met. I've haven't yet heard anyone speak to the contrary.Matt Harris is an asset to employer and colleague alike, and I hope our paths will continue to coincide throughout our respective careers.
